name: Agent
description: An operative skilled at solving problems with a keen mind or deft hand.
key_attributes: Opportunist (Key Talent): Reroll the plot die once per round.

name: Envoy
description: An insightful negotiator who adeptly influences others.
key_attributes: Rousing Presence (Key Talent): Make an ally Determined.

name: Hunter
description: A skilled sharpshooter and outdoorsperson who seeks and eliminates problems.
key_attributes: Seek Quarry (Key Talent): Choose one character to pursue and gain an advantage against.

name: Leader
description: A poised commander who directs and guides others to be their best.
key_attributes: Decisive Command (Key Talent): Add a d4 'command die' to an ally's tests.

name: Scholar
description: An adroit thinker who excels at planning and building.
key_attributes: Erudition (Key Talent): Gain bonus skill ranks that you can reallocate.

name: Warrior
description: A fighter who relies on their skill, brute strength, or indomitable will.
key_attributes: Vigilant Stance (Key Talent): Gain a fighting stance that makes you more responsive and flexible in combat.
